metadata.title: Evaluate to true if the string datatype is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the string datatype and all of its valid operations.

criteria.comment: True if the equals operation is supported

criterion.comment: Test that the equals operation is supported with two equal string values.
Test that the equals operation is supported with two unequal string values.

criteria.comment: True if the not equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Test that the not equal operation is supported with two equal string values.
Test that the not equal operation is supported with two unequal string values.

criteria.comment: True if the case insensitive equals operation is supported

criterion.comment: Test that the case insensitive equals operation is supported with two mixed case equal string values.
Test that the case insensitive equals operation is supported with two mixed case unequal string values.

criteria.comment: True if the case insensitive not equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Test that the case insensitive not equal operation is supported with two mixed case equal string values.
Test that the case insensitive not equal operation is supported with two mixed case unequal string values.

criteria.comment: True if the pattern match operation is supported

criterion.comment: Test that the pattern match operation is supported with a string value that matches the specified regular expression.
Test that the pattern match operation is supported with a string value that doesn't match the specified regular expression.

variable_test.comment: Test that the equals operation is supported with two equal string values.
Test that the equals operation is supported with two unequal string values.
Test that the not equal operation is supported with two equal string values.
Test that the not equal operation is supported with two unequal string values.
Test that the case insensitive equals operation is supported with two mixed case equal string values.
Test that the case insensitive equals operation is supported with two mixed case unequal string values.
Test that the case insensitive not equal operation is supported with two mixed case equal string values.
Test that the case insensitive not equal operation is supported with two mixed case unequal string values.
Test that the pattern match operation is supported with a string value that matches the specified regular expression.
Test that the pattern match operation is supported with a string value that doesn't match the specified regular expression.
